PHRASE.LANG:
Show your love for all things pink with the Pretty In Pink Value Bundle.

This bundle contains the following items:

• Cupcake Dress Bundle (top, bottom, bracelet, heels)
• Hot Pink Bikini Bundle (top, bottom, heels)
• Pink Butterfly Bundle (top, bottom, heels)
• Superhero - Pink Orchid Bundle (top, bottom/shoes, hair, gloves)

Each object will be added to its relevant wardrobe or furniture category.
